## VirtualBaseProps interface

Common props for [VirtualList](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallist.md) and [VirtualGrid](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualgrid.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VirtualBaseProps 
```

<tr><td>

[maxCssSize?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.maxcsssize.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Maximum size for CSS element beyond which layout breaks. You should never normally need to change this. The default value is compatible with all major browsers.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[minNumPages?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.minnumpages.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The minimum number of virtual pages to use when inner container would otherwise be more than [VirtualBaseProps.maxCssSize](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.maxcsssize.md) big. You should never normally need to change this.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[useIsScrolling?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.useisscrolling.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Determines whether the component should track whether it's being actively scrolled and pass to child items as [VirtualBaseItemProps.isScrolling](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseitemprops.isscrolling.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
